title: Evelynn is unplayable
body:
I am a diamond V Evelynn Main, and i find it hard to play the champion i love most .

It dosn't matter where i start, but after a leash RED + another jungle camp, It dosn't seem like i can kill the 3rd camp/ blue buff.  Evelynn is just way too squishy and that also makes her slower in jungle camps.

With the additional patch, where purple smite got 15 second increase, her clears are now slower, and it is harder to play the jungle.

In lolking, her win rate has dived to 40% once, and this week, her win rate rised slightly to 42% . 

Edit: Once she recalls, she will also only be level 2, not level 3. That means she cannot put a point in "W" to speed back into the jungle phase,  Once she returns to jungle, she will have whichever smite, to kill blue/ or red / gromp/golems, in which after killing the first jungle monster and the second, she will also barely be able to kill a 3rd camp, leading her to recall once more. 

Evelynn overall is hard -unplayable because she was squishy to begin with, and now has a hard time catching up in jungle, but now if she does not get ahead in game, she cannot afford to buy items to get enough gold to stay tanky

replies.body: The Live Gameplay team was looking at her for some buffs in the next patch. I think that jungling speed/safety is an area of focus that they're trying to improve. She has an especially weak first clear, we agree.
Eve doesn't have to be a jungler. If you just revert the dmg type nerf on her E from phys back to mag dmg I can see her being a viable mid/top laner again.
I kind of agree with this.  I kind of wish she was balanced with her laning in mind as well as her jungle.

aye, and I also dislike how her primary jungle build is an off-tank build.

Seriously, she is a scrawny, stealthy, shadowy character, so why the heck is her most viable build something you'd see on a tanky jungler?

Here's why:  with her dmg type having been changed, she can't counter resistances built by the enemy, so if an assassin can't assassinate, they become a second rate dps, and in order to dps at melee range, you need to live long enough to dish it out.

Just in general, even for an "assassin" she has no real burst or escapes to speak of since her kit was gutted. Being invis doesn't mean anything when you get blown up in .3 seconds from general AOE (not even focused)

> [{quoted}](name=RiotScruffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2014-12-11T22:11:51.015+0000)
> The Live Gameplay team was looking at her for some buffs in the next patch. I think that jungling speed/safety is an area of focus that they're trying to improve. She has an especially weak first clear, we agree.

Thank you for the reply !! I am glad to know :)

Here fixed her for you, just make these changes: 

Ravage:
COOLDOWN: 9
Active: Evelynn slashes a target twice, dealing physical damage with each strike. Evelynn then gains bonus attack speed, **and 5/6/7/8/9/10 +5% AP hp every time she damages a monster ** for **5** seconds.


TBH should just be every time she deals damage in general but I doubt riot would go for that.
Perhaps with the new jungle changes riot should maybe look into the jungle masteries for tweaks
Woo! Can't wait :D

> [{quoted}](name=RiotScruffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2014-12-11T22:11:51.015+0000)
>
> The Live Gameplay team was looking at her for some buffs in the next patch. I think that jungling speed/safety is an area of focus that they're trying to improve. She has an especially weak first clear, we agree.

Well its been some patch and 1/2 since this and still really haven't seen any significant improvements at all with this direction. Honeslty, if you guys are just going wait until her VU to rework her again, can't you say so

> [{quoted}](name=RiotScruffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2014-12-11T22:11:51.015+0000)
>
> The Live Gameplay team was looking at her for some buffs in the next patch. I think that jungling speed/safety is an area of focus that they're trying to improve. She has an especially weak first clear, we agree.

Help Wukong too!

And the updates hit yesterday... and are very disappointing. 

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M_tlid6oi_Q/VI9vRzz1JvI/AAAAAAAAf88/TWJH8fRsj-0/s1600/eve1.jpg
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fnJ5OdGWtA8/VI9vR__dBoI/AAAAAAAAf9A/vwP8sxTuwd0/s1600/eve2.jpg

These are honestly a joke... they aren't at all the kind of buff she needs. Giving her passive a 2% update and her E an on-hit effects... no.   She needs more base damage for one thing, maybe more base health... and just overall damage to be raised again cause she can barely survive.

Yes I agree that's true.  I fear for all the new players that are trying out Evelynn as well. For champions that do not have any runes ( unranked level 30- ),  Evelynn dies even faster without any jungle runes. 

Hopefully Riot can do something about my favorite champion
hopefully not. Perma Stealth is a design issue at this point for solo q.
Insult for no reason on an innocent post to get a buff? I hope Moderators are looking at this post, especially if it's the 3rd hottest topic on the forum.

> [{quoted}](name=Kchaosrei,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2014-12-11T01:15:35.816+0000)
> hopefully not. Perma Stealth is a design issue at this point for solo q.


For people who are arguing over {{champion:28}} and thinks she is broken/imbalanced because of her permanent stealth – it is simply not true. I would like to point out that there are many ways to counteract and deal with her. Why am I bringing this up? From my insight, I see a lot of players (especially in bronze-platinum tier) who refuse to buy a single vision ward – place it on the map or play champions that lack any crowd control. Evelynn does not scale well in terms of late game potential. She falls off in terms of damage/inability to keep up with farm and if she falls behind – there is no comeback mechanism for her. She'll continue to greatly fall off because of her lack ability to obtain kills and farm in her own jungle. Any champions {{champion:92}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:89}}  that are AD bruisers, Tanks, or heavy burst damage output would wreck Evelynn. Her health is equivalent to that of a Master Yi Jungle except she does way less damage than any other jungle assassin.


-Why would you take the best feature of Evelynn?
She is fun to play because she is suited to be an invisible assassin in exchange for her low health. However, she still struggles because of the recent patches in jungle buffs and reducing the hp sustain gained from {{summoner:11}} She is meant to be played as an assassin – but we should not cripple her to the extent where she is barely able to come out of the jungle alive.

She has a 42.49% win rate (3rd lowest from {{champion:60}} & {{champion:429}} ) in comparison to {{champion:59}} & {{champion:254}}   (51.6%), {{champion:80}}  (54.31%) and of course {{champion:19}} at (59%)

There are a lot of top tier junglers that I could mention, but I want to be short and succinct in that Evelynn is struggling in the new jungle patch and that removing her permanent stealth would just be detrimental to the champion itself.

funny i said perma stealth not eve. A concept for the game can be bad or broken while a champ is weak. When eve is strong the stealth is a glaring issue. The fact that solo Q players can not work together is a huge advantage for eve. It takes a team to properly ward against stealth and in solo q that is sometimes impossible do to who you been paired with.

but the trash that do not want to think will just down vote anyways and stay ignorant.

> [{quoted}](name=Kchaosrei,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-11T08:58:28.743+0000)
> funny i said perma stealth not eve. A concept for the game can be bad or broken while a champ is weak. When eve is strong the stealth is a glaring issue. The fact that solo Q players can not work together is a huge advantage for eve. It takes a team to properly ward against stealth and in solo q that is sometimes impossible do to who you been paired with.
> 
> but the trash that do not want to think will just down vote anyways and stay ignorant.

When any champion is strong, they are an issue regardless. The fact that solo Q players cannot work together is a huge advantage for any champion that can roam.  I see Evelynn's kit as perfect.  Nobody complained much about it in season 4 after another nerf. 
Reason why Permastealth shouldn't be an issue is because Evelynn is not stealthed in her own jungle, and her range makes it so that you know many seconds in advance that she's going to attack you. Her stealth is what makes some of Evelynn's weak points viable : No CC ( except for ult ), Squishy champion, limited by mana ( unlike champs who operate off of fury).  Take away her stealth, and you have pretty much a Shyvanna/ Yi who does not do as much damage, and is probably squishier.   
 If an individual's concern is Evelynn's stealth,  I can say that Twitch / Shaco stealth is more deadlier due to the fact that they can pop up right beside you,  compared to Evelynn who actually cannot stealth beside you.  Eve's stealth is honestly only used from her pathing from the jungle to your lane. Whereas the other stealthy champions are used from going in your lane to kill you.  Permastealth on Eve shoudn't be an issue. It's actually what makes her unique and is what shapes her identity.

With vision being so hard and the limit pink wards stealthy champs are inherently strong gankers. To properly ward against this type you have to go in to the enemy jungle. This requires help from the whole team to do safely and properly in the early game.  This level of constant  coordination is not in the cards even at the gold level. 

Perma stealth may be Eve's thing. That does not mean it is not problematic for solo Q. Eve is designed more around the concept that players will work together (5s).

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-10T23:01:14.749+0000)
> Yeah Evelynn took it up the ass hard during this patch.
> 
> Since rework release, I'd wager to say Evelynn has had the most indirect/direct nerfs of any character in LoL.

Up the ass you say?
Dat's hawt

There are a lot of problems with Evelynn right now. She is a fragile champion that's very weak against other junglers in comparison to sustainable/mobile champions such as Lee Sin, Jarvan, and Warwick. I agree that she is unplayable for this current meta because all the jungle camps are harder to clear and the monsters are buffed. I am hoping for a patch that will give her a buff instead of nerfing her.
Have you considered playing her in lane? mana problems aside she can roam pretty decently with ult and permastealth.

I liked playing eve mid until they changed her e to physical and cut the dmg on her ult and q so it became really ineffective to build dfg.
I don't know why riot thinks this champ is playable with the changes they have made to the jungle and items on top of all the nerfs she has gotten since her rework. I think they have nerfed every Skill but her W at-least twice since rework, even her passive got a range and cd nerf.

What roll does eve even fill anymore? she is not an assassin and she is not really tanky even after she gets 2 tank items. i dont know why its an assassins roll to soak damage...like how does that even make sense.

Pre rework-Post nerf eve would have more success in the current version of the game. Atleast she could dry-hump the enemy jungle in her superior version of stealth till they got low enough to assassinate them...like an Assassin.

I don't understand how perma stealth (fake stealth at that) is even an issue considering that Eve more than pays for it with her kit. No Hard CC, no CC at all minus ult, no AA steroids, no escape move unless a kill is secured, no ranged damage spell minus long CD ult and hybrid scaling.

Meanwhile you have guys like Panth/VI/J4/Lee SIn who have multiple gap closers/autoattack evades/stuns/scaling damage/ArPen/escape/Shields/Tanky Build Path/etc etc.

It's like ppl haven't played D&D style games where assassin/rogues are SUPPOSED to have the battlefield/positioning advantage whereas mages have control/burst and warriors have more Damage and CC/Defense depending on type. 

Eve is SUPPOSED to sneak up behind you and make smart 1 v 2's that you don't see coming, she trades for it dearly in her stats...that's how she's designed. In exchange for that, if she's caught out in the open you auto win any fight even 1 v 2 most times simply because of how weak she is, your job is just trying to outplay her by making her play her hand too early.


But what....this is LoL where the only 'outplay' is Vayne spamming Q against melee champs annd dodging all their CC or some one pressing Zhonya's. Classic D&D strategic depth has been thrown out the window in this game and all labelled toxic by both devs and community. Bruisers complain about Ranged for doing what they are supposed to do, Ranged complain about assassins for doing their job, and tanks are so nerfed and poorly designed that they cannot fulfill their job outside the support role while 'berserker' type champions have been designed so pathetically that they've been the laughing stock of the game outside bronze elo since before s1 begin....and these things called bruisers also got made. Biggest mistake LoL ever made...there's a reason bruisers don't exist outside of LoL in any game

Get a spell vamp quint, now you can do three camps.

And flat AP instead of scaling. Why are you complaining about her early when using late game runes?

There is a rune page called " Evelynn" That is all early game runes. I would suggest you to do your research ( My runes and that which  includes playing Evelynn in the jungle with your spellvamp theorycraft) before you ask me why I am complaining.

> There is a rune page called " Evelynn" That is all early game runes. I would suggest you to do your research ( My runes and that which  includes playing Evelynn in the jungle with your spellvamp theorycraft) before you ask me why I am complaining.

 I did, and the rune page for you that LoLKing shows named Evelynn has scaling blue AP runes.

The difference between your level 1 Eve and Mine is 5 AP with 2% spellvamp.  Which btw, as I reach level 2 after my camp, the difference in AP is smaller.   If your argument is that 5 AP + 2% spellvamp quints is what changes the jungle, then more the reason Eve should be buffed. A champion should not have to have specifically different pages just to survive in the jungle. Based on your comments on other threads, you also need a Sheen later on in the game. That takes out alot of variation as I never build a sheen on Evelynn at all.  From a balance perspective,  8AD+ 15-20 AP is enough of an advantage to be considered ' early game runes".  It is the buff to jungle that makes evelynn weak. There are always ways to get around the jungle with specific pages/build. I could even get +35AP rune page to Eve as a starter and get to my third camp. However, are all these tweaks really necessary? Evelynn, along with many champs, should not be restricted to certain rune pages/builds. Don't forget, there are new players ( unranked ) who can't afford an optimal rune page at all. Does this mean all of those eve players does NOT deserve a buff? Speaking for the community as a whole, Eve really needs a tweak in her values. What works for you, may not work for everyone else.

I can't agree with this.  Yes. There are general pages, but there are also certain champions that do benefit from specialization.

Newer players not being able to afford the optimal rune page? That's not a problem. It's something to aim for and look forward to...
Eve needs a buff. Or two or five or 17.

What Evelynn Should be : 

1)Invisible champion = pressure at early game(mega early game ,  fear of gank)
2) good DMG at mid game 
3) Fall off at Late game

Live version:

1) There is no pressure from her at Early game bc Jungle is so hard that she will not gank you with 100 HP
2)No more Mana regen for her(she has mega problems with mana, spirit stone out)
3)Mid game of her is bad , due to nerfs and GOLD starvation and build path.
4)She Fallin off even more harder in late game

I wish they'd just completely rework her ulti and bring back eve mid
That champ was so fun to play, even after the nerfs. The E damage type change just killed it completely, though.
Evelynn has to base after first buff and is easily counterjungled.  I agree she needs work on her kit, but riot is dragging their feet on her.
Sejuani was right up there with her, but they buffed her this patch. I'm really hope they do something for Eve soon.

I loved playing her for the last 2 seasons and now with the jungle changes... she's so useless. Can barely clear 2 camps before having to back... it's just WTF ?!  I had to run high defense pages in order even get any where in one game.

Eve was already squishy prior to the new jungle. They made jungle insanely harder and they buffed her like... 5 AD or some crap like that.

She went from "unstable" to "Yorrick"

Idk if this will solve all your problems but here's what I've found about squishes in the new jungle
1. Never start red buff - if you start red you are squandering the strong heal you get from smiting red. You need that hp to make up for the lack of pots
2. First clear always sucks, expect to back at lvl 3 after 3 camps
3. Get good leash and save smite for red 
         okay numbers somewhat redundant but here's what I recommend as Evelyn.
-Start blue and get GOOD leash, tell them u will save smite and will need extra help. Then go clear wolves pots as needed. Then get red and smite when health goes below half. There ya go lvl3 enough gold to upgrade machete and get pots. If u feel you need the bot leash and your on blue side, start Krugs with good leash then take red and smite for health then go for blue or smaller camp To hit 3. (Not as ideal as starting blue cause i think you may be oom by the time you get to blue :/ sorry never played evelynn) but I hope this helps you in the new jungle friend!
If you start blue and take a camp in between your smite should be up for red even if you smite blue.

Have you tried this yet? On the champs I used I found myself having to wait around for smite to come back up. But I haven't played a whole lot of mana hungry champs in the jungle so I haven't tried that but like twice and it was pretty close calls (almost died). Probably best for mana hungry champs but smiting blue with full mana feels like a waste to me.

Minor buff to armor,
Minor buff to initial attack speed,
Add a twinkle of *flat base damage* onto her ult,

And that is all I can ask for.
As long as she can make it to the 3rd camp without me having to alter my own rune page- i'm happy .  :)

Evelynn's clears are on par, if not better, than most tanks and can easily gank early. I don't see the issue here, besides the fact that your game knowledge on how to clear in the new jungle is piss poor.

If you want a jungler who was killed with the changes because of early clearings look at Wukong.

The REAL issue here is the fact that she needs to snowball that much harder and needs to build a ton more damage to succeed. Evelynn is weak, she is NOT unplayable.

> [{quoted}](name=Crabby,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=0035,timestamp=2014-12-16T22:50:32.426+0000)

> Evelynn's clears are on par, if not better, than most tanks and can easily gank early. I don't see the issue here.
> 
> If you want a jungler who was killed with the changes because of early clearings look at Wukong.
> 
> The REAL issue here is the fact that she needs to snowball that much harder and needs to build a ton more damage to succeed.


Her early ganks are weak dude.
Her base damage got nerfed, and both her Q and E received nerfs as well.
He early damage is piss poor, and the lack of escapes/gap closers compared to other decent junglers make her bad right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Annoth84,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=00350000,timestamp=2014-12-16T22:52:28.120+0000)
>
> Her early ganks are weak dude.
> Her base damage got nerfed, and both her Q and E received nerfs as well.
> He early damage is piss poor, and the lack of escapes/gap closers compared to other decent junglers make her bad right now.

Evelynn's early ganks always required good timing, meaning you had to get there when the enemy laner was fighting your laner.

I also tend to bring ignite or exhaust 100% now since you need to secure the early kills.

> [{quoted}](name=Crabby,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=003500000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T22:52:45.211+0000)
>
> Evelynn's early ganks always required good timing, meaning you had to get there when the enemy laner was fighting your laner.
> 
> I also tend to bring ignite or exhaust 100% now since you need to secure the early kills.

The issue is that other junglers can do the exact same and do so far better and more easily than evelynn.
Better burst, better utilit, and not as reliant ons ummoners

> [{quoted}](name=Annoth84,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=0035000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T23:17:37.654+0000)
>
> The issue is that other junglers can do the exact same and do so far better and more easily than evelynn.
> Better burst, better utilit, and not as reliant ons ummoners

It has always been like this.

> [{quoted}](name=Crabby,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=L2EEGRhb,comment-id=00350000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T23:23:11.435+0000)
>
> It has always been like this.

No, not always.
In the past she had burst to make up for the lack of utility and the ult gave her a means of survival so she could escape like Fizz and Zed do.
They nerfed her base damage and ratios, turned her ravage physical, and this ended up gutting her terribly to the point she can't do anything worth picking her for right now.
Ravage needs to be magic based against so she can actually burst.
If not that, rework her asap instead of leaving her as a mess.
